channel.title: ~Wvu Colleage Project~
channel.description:
~About Our Project~ ~Server BAse is Old Mopar So Dont Complain~
Wvu College Is Currently Invloved in many projects we are their latest project were redesiging Runescape i have noticed alot of you have 503 and 508 servers we hope between this Year And Next Year to Have A COmplety redesigned Runescape We Hope To Take This From Not Just Runescape But To A very Big comunity We Are Currently Releasing Our Test SOurce At www.moparisthebest.com This Server Has Many Errors You Will Have To Fix This Because I will not RElease My Fully Working One With no errors till Later On Maby In November December the Setup On This Server Is NoT perfecT But We Will Have Many New Things Objects MaH Gurl Angel is Working ON a client And Second Server On Port 5555
~Why We Are Desiging This~ Basicly Were Just DOing this As a way to Practice COding And This Server Will Be Restating Alot For COnstant Updating Were Goiging To Be 24/7 As Soon as angel gets her destop hooked up in her doorm room Well ne ways So We are going to work on this for at least 2 Years This Is For Our BEnifit And Soon To Be Yours
~Server Uptime~ Server Will be up 19Hrs A Day till angel Gets Her Server Rack Hooked up to her destop Well Anyways 19 hrs Aday And 24/7 soon
~Server Sucurity~ Well For Starters Dont Try To HAck Us we have a Server Monitering GUI That tracks All Attempts And Logs Them So Any Attempts Will Be Reported To www.wvu.edu And Further Actions Will Be Taken Plus Were Adding Syi Blocker And spmam plus Muti Login For Those Who Are Complety Iggnorat ~To Perserve Uptime When Im Gone And Auto restatrting~
~Server Coding~ We Have Only 2 Acutaly Server Coders So Anyone Who Would Like To Join Us In The Project Please Send Me A Pm On Forums Or Email Me At joelandbrittiney@hotmail.com This Server Coding Would help The Whole Mmorpg Comunity But We Need Help anyone With Any Ideals Or Wants To Helo Contact us:][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2008, 11:44:43 am[/size][hr]thank you our project will consist of a 2 Year peroid Is How Long Our Server Will Be Up then after i graduate i may use my compluter at home or buy a server rack to keep it alive Becuase We Have Alota People Who have Requested This To Be Created
agian Any age may help Or play on the server ill release the ip soon but as i have noticed moparisthebest.com doesnt like avertise ment so im requesting To release this server ip: we have been coding many years i am the creator Of many sources over the past 4 years im currently 18 and going to wvu in usa wv
thanks for anyone who will assist us in the project
